questionText.description: The actual question or doubt submitted by the user

answerText.description: Answer provided to the doubt, if any

userAcceptedAnswer.description: Indicates whether the user has accepted or is satisfied with the provided answer

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the doubt was created

answeredAt.description: Timestamp when the doubt was answered

closedAt.description: Timestamp when the doubt was closed

upvotes.description: Number of upvotes received by the doubt

isResolved.description: Flag indicating whether the doubt has been resolved
